name: Blue Blood Blues
description:
Designed with "nobility" as the core aesthetic, Blue Blood Blues is a music inspired shoot'em up where you, as the knight of blues, must defend the parade from the incoming musical monsters who want to taint your sound with their own!

Features:

Manage the health of both yourself and the crowd as the enemies draw closer!

Collect power ups and stay alive for another day as the music plays on!

Compete with your friends to get the highest score (same computer only)!

Controls:

use WASD or the arrows to move around

hold or press space to shoot enemies

press ESC to pause the game

The team:

Theo Flejmer - project manager and programmer

Kiwi Backman - project manager

Josefin Glasell - programmer

Katalin Przeszl - background and UI artist

Madalina Rusu - character artist

Alexander Frestadius - designer and playtester

Special thanks to StaticP who allowed us to use his audio for our game!
